item.title: Kynan add a quote by Connie Willis
item.description: "Actually, writers have no business writing about their own works. They either wax conceited, saying things like: 'My brilliance is possibly most apparent in my dazzling short story, "The Cookiepants Hypotenuse."' Or else they get unbearably cutesy: 'My cat Ootsywootums has given me all my best ideas, hasn't oo, squeezums?" -- Connie Willis

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Tomorrow may be hell, but today was a good writing day, and on the good writing days nothing else matters." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The road to hell is paved with adverbs." -- Stephen King

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Rob Sheffield
item.description: "There are all kinds of mix tapes. there is always a reason to make one." -- Rob Sheffield

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "I didn't fail the test, I just found 100 ways to do it wrong." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Mel Brooks
item.description: "Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die." -- Mel Brooks

item.title: Kynan add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You don't have to burn books to destroy a culture. Just get people to stop reading them." -- Ray Bradbury
